basics.name: Daniel Ilies
basics.label: Software Development Engineer
basics.summary: Software engineer with 3 years of production experience in automation, scripting, and full-stack development; proficient in Python, JavaScript/TypeScript, Node.js, and Unix-based environments; built ML-integrated tools, internal dashboards, and automation frameworks; collaborative team player eager to contribute to ASIC design workflows and developer tooling.

work.name: DevelBox
work.summary: Developed internal software tools, automation frameworks, and ML-integrated systems in Unix environments.
highlights: Built AdCognition ML ad detection system: Python/TensorFlow training pipeline + TypeScript/TensorFlow.js Chrome extension with over 90% detection accuracy.
Maintained Linux-based ML training infrastructure with Flask services, model conversion, and TensorBoard monitoring.
Developed internal automation tools and dashboards using Vue.js, improving workflows and resource tracking.
Wrote and maintained Python, TypeScript, and shell scripts for automation and testing.
Participated in code reviews and mentored junior developers on best practices.

Implemented responsive design and cross-browser compatibility.
Collaborated with backend team on API integration and data flow.
